name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.safemode.min.datanodes
description:
Specifies the number of datanodes that must be considered alive
    before the name node exits safemode.
    Values less than or equal to 0 mean not to take the number of live
    datanodes into account when deciding whether to remain in safe mode
    during startup.
    Values greater than the number of datanodes in the cluster
    will make safe mode permanent.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
description:
Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce
  task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining
  connection.

name: dfs.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write

name: dfs.namenode.max-num-blocks-to-log
description:
Puts a limit on the number of blocks printed to the log by the Namenode
    after a block report.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threshold.millis
description:
Configure 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. This is the number of milliseconds
    to wait before starting up a 'hedged' read.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.throughputInMBperSec
description:
Maximum disk bandwidth used by diskbalancer
      during read from a source disk. The unit is MB/sec.

name: mapreduce.am.max-attempts
description:
The maximum number of application attempts. It is a
  application-specific setting. It should not be larger than the global number
  set by resourcemanager. Otherwise, it will be override. The default number is
  set to 2, to allow at least one retry for AM.

name: net.topology.script.number.args
description:
The max number of args that the script configured with
    net.topology.script.file.name should be run with. Each arg is an
    IP address.
